sentences.en: He pushed everyone full speed ahead until production hit a bottleneck.
sentences.cn: 他敦促每个人全速前进，直到生产遇到瓶颈。

sentences.en: Even though the task takes longer, the bottleneck is removed and tokens no longer queue up.
sentences.cn: 即使任务占用的时间较长，但消除了瓶颈，并且令牌不用再排队。

sentences.en: Could this class cause a bottleneck?
